message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm not sure I can go that high. How about $105? Let's see if we can find a price we both like.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $115.
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price.  $110 is the most I can do. If we can't reach an agreement at this point, I'll need to move on.
I understand you're close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $112.
